turn.2: 2011 Ligue 1 (Senegal) The 2011 Ligue 1 season was the 46th of the competition of the first-tier football in Senegal and the fourth professional season.
turn.4: The tournament was organized by the Senegalese Football Federation.
turn.6: The season began earlier on 18 December 2010 and finished on 9 September 2011.
turn.7: Is there any other interesting information I should know?
turn.8: It was the third season labelled as a "League" ("Ligue" in French).
turn.10: US Ouakam won their first and recent title, and a year later would compete in the 2012 CAF Champions League.

turn.12: ASC Diaraf, second place and the winner of the 2012 Senegalese Cup Casa Sport participated in the 2012 CAF Confederation Cup, it was the last time bringing a second place club, only the cup winner would participate in the following season.
